description:
A game about being one with the whole;

A game about understanding;

A game about nonsense? maybe;

A game where things have reasons into themselves;

A game where things have no reason for you;

A game about nothing;

A game about everything;

A game about a room;

A game?

(Made for LudumDare 37 in less than 72 hours)

Developers:
Danilo Pereira
Giovanna Albiero
Gustavo Haschich
Milla Luchak
